imdb.plot outline: When the time came for Veer to be married, Rangeela was dispatched to abduct a girl for him. Since the girl had to be married earlier due to some astrological conditions. Veer orders Rangeela to falsely marry her. Rangeela cheats Shivani and marries her. But poor Shivani truly believes him to be her husband. Her world comes crashing down when her own husband dumps her at Veer's feet to be remarried to him. Despite Shivani's protests, Veer forcibly marries her again. But she is steadfast in her loyalty to Rangeela for the first time, feels guilty for his actions and is torn between his mater and Shivani. Soon the guilt blossoms into love. But Shivani was his mistress and in order to win her, Rangeela had to overthrow his own master. Thus begins the slave's journey from bondage to freedom.
imdb.title: Ghulaam
plot: Veer Pratap rules over the deadly village Berahampur with brute force with the help of his trusted lieutenant and loyal slave - Rangeela.

When the time came for Veer to be married, Rangeela was dispatched to abduct a girl for him. Since the girl had to be married earlier due to some astrological conditions. Veer orders Rangeela to falsely marry her. Rangeela cheats Shivani and marries her. But poor Shivani truly believes him to be her husband. Her world comes crashing down when her own husband dumps her at Veer's feet to be remarried to him. Despite Shivani's protests, Veer forcibly marries her again. But she is steadfast in her loyalty to Rangeela for the first time, feels guilty for his actions and is torn between his mater and Shivani. Soon the guilt blossoms into love. But Shivani was his mistress and in order to win her, Rangeela had to overthrow his own master. Thus begins the slave's journey from bondage to freedom.
